name: The Last Warrior
description:
Download and Install the Unity Webplayer. Allow the Plug In to run on your computer.

A 2D Top Down Action Game where you play as a lone warrior defending his village. Knock the assailants off your watch place.

Controls:

W - forward

S - Backwards

Mouse - Rotate

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Credits

Trevor Swafford

Tyler Quillen

Corbin Barney

Yanilyn Florez-Ortiz

Mike Saez
